section.name: Opal Documentation
section.p: Below you can find a list of available documents on Opal. You can also check out the publications section (on the navigation bar) to get some more documentation.

ul.li: Installation Guide: This is the main documentation and also the one you should use if you are trying to started with Opal
Opal State Database: this document explains how to set up an external Data Base to store Opal invocation logs
Opal GSI: this document explains how to configure Opal so that it supports GSI authentication
Opal Scheduler: this document explains how to configure Opal in order to submit job using either a local scheduler with DRMAA or using Globus to access remote schedulers

Opal GUI: this document explains the usage and set up of this new feature just released in Opal 1.9. The Opal GUI supports the authomatic generation of submission form customized on the input arguments of the underlining service
